body_html:
@ray-mami, Do you have TensorRT 3.0.4 for Ubuntu 14.04 installed in the system? This error usually happens when user installs TensorRT 3.0.4 for Ubuntu 16.04 instead of 14.04 when using pip package.

No ， TensorRT 3.0.4 is not installed in the system. LD_LIBRARY_PATH contains the path of TensorRT-4.0.1.6
body_text:
@ray-mami, Do you have TensorRT 3.0.4 for Ubuntu 14.04 installed in the system? This error usually happens when user installs TensorRT 3.0.4 for Ubuntu 16.04 instead of 14.04 when using pip package.

No ， TensorRT 3.0.4 is not installed in the system.  LD_LIBRARY_PATH contains the path of  TensorRT-4.0.1.6
body:
> @ray-mami, Do you have **TensorRT 3.0.4 for Ubuntu 14.04** installed in the system? This error usually happens when user installs TensorRT 3.0.4 for Ubuntu 16.04 instead of 14.04 when using pip package.

No ， TensorRT 3.0.4 is not installed in the system.  **LD_LIBRARY_PATH** contains the path of  TensorRT-4.0.1.6
